content: the rib as wide as you wish in size small i knitted a 3 cm rib margin optional round 1 knit round 2 *k1 m1rp * repeat from * to * to end of round see explanation below and the video at hunglish knitter youtube channel round 3 * k1 slip 1 stitch purl-wise with the yarn held in front * repeat from * to * to end of round round 4 * slip 1 stitch knit-wise with the yarn held in back p1 * repeat from * to * to end of round round 5 * k1 slip 1 stitch purl-wise with the yarn held in front * repeat from * to * to end of round round 6 continue with a 4 mm us6 circular needle the right needle only first *place the next two stitches knit wise and knit them together * repeat from * to * to end of round m1rp m1 purl right slant insert the left needle from back to front under the strand between the last stitch worked and the first stitch on the left needle purl the strand through the front loop to twist it page 2 of 7 dividing for raglan after the margin divide the stitches for raglan increases without working the sts by placing markers on both sides of the 1 raglan stitch a total of 8 stitch markers as follows 17 18 19 19 21 sts right back 1 raglan st 14 14 14 16 16 sts right sleeve 1 raglan st 34 36 38 38 42 sts front 1 raglan st 14 14 14 16 16 sts left sleeve 1 raglan st 17 18 19 19 21 sts left back the beginning of the round is placed in the middle of the back where in the beginning the work joined in the round raglan increases & elevation now work short row to shape the neckline while at the same time work raglan increases on both sides of the raglan stitch use the bobby pin elevation technique when working short row for detailed instructions see video at hunglish knitter youtube channel work as follows row 1 rs knit to marker m1r knit raglan stitch m1l work the stitches into chart a s / m /l or chart b xl / xxl as shown in the diagrams right sleeve m1r knit raglan stitch m1l k1 place bobby pin turn 4 sts have been increased row 2 ws purl to beginning of the round to the tail of yarn while following the lace pattern on the sleeve purl to marker m1r purl raglan stitch m1l purl to marker m1r purl raglan stitch m1l left sleeve p1 place bobby pin turn 4 sts have been increased row 3 rs knit to marker knit raglan stitch work the stitches into lace pattern left sleeve knit raglan stitch knit to beginning of the round to the tail of yarn knit to marker m1r knit raglan stitch m1l work the stitches lace pattern right
